total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of 1s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the pattern of numbers other than 1 and 0 in the input grid.
Q3: Determine the relationship between the pattern of 1s and the pattern of other numbers.
Q4: Apply the relationship found in Q3 to the input grid of the quiz.
Q5: Generate the output grid based on the relationship applied in Q4.
